writer.name: 弗朗西丝卡·德·萨维奥 Francesca De Sapio

introduction: The beauty of a neighborhood in the heart of Rome during the first years of the 20's after a pandemic that shocked the entire world, is about to be lost.Lovita comes back to her grandma's house, after her mother's death, waiting to be assigned a job as a school teacher.While struggling with her blind uncle’s depression and the unaffordable rent increase of the apartment, she meets Lucio, a childhood friend who involves her in preparing a show in the neighborhood social center, also in danger of closing.Lovita will try to help the theater group to keep their place, and free herself from an intricate series of incidents that will change everyone’s life for ever.
